sentence.Network_en: For a system, Hamiltonian is invariant under any translation of spatial coordinates.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于一体系, 哈密算符在任何空间坐标变换下是不变的.

sentence.Network_en: The speed of light is an invariant constant.
The first invariant of strain is independent of the coordinate system being used.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一应变不变量与所用的坐标系无关.

list.abs: 1.引言经典的绝热不变量(adiabatic invariant)是指在系统的某参数缓慢变化时,相对该参数的变化而改变更慢的某一物理量[1].绝热不变量又称缓渐不变量或浸渐不.
inulin 菊粉invariant point 不变点invariant system 不变系
integral inequality 积分不等式integral invariant 积分不变式integral kernel 积分核
invariant of strain 应变不变量invariant subgroup 不变子群inverse circuit 反演电路

means.word_mean: 1. unaffected by a designated operation or transformation
2. persistent in occurrence and unvarying in nature;

auth_sentence.content: Thus, they remain invariant under mutual transformation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus, they remain invariant under mutual transformation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus, they remain invariant under mutual transformation.

auth_sentence.content: They are universally invariant, conditions may change but the laws never vary.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are universally invariant, conditions may change but the laws never vary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are universally invariant, conditions may change but the laws never vary.

auth_sentence.content: In my view, this explains the constant or invariant speed of light.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In my view, this explains the constant or invariant speed of light.
